title: For all the "errhmahgheeer draven mode" threads
body:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Internet_troll

> In Internet slang, a troll is a person who sows discord ... for their own amusement.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/April_Fools%27_Day

> April Fools' Day (sometimes called All Fools' Day) is celebrated every year on 1 April by playing practical jokes ... the jokes and their victims are called April fools. 

WP riot, WP.
